original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 326.60/90 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 326.60/90 to the US dollar on Thursday, from 326.70/327.00 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.45/55 percent from 13.60/75 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.85/14.00 percent from 13.95/14.10 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.90/14.10 percent from 14.00/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.15/20 percent from 14.15/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.20/30 percent, from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.20/45 percent, from 14.30/45 percent. (Colombo/Dec7/2023)
